extendedInfo.description: This application for Pandit Chankay Quote. Continues display quote of Pandit Chanakya using next and previous button. User can also bookmark itâs interested quote. This application also provided functionality to share particular quote on social networking sites Ads Information:In order to give you a free app and keep developing more free apps in the future, we are integrating a search tool to our application. This will add a few access points to your device (hence the permissions) to direct you to the web search service. Please consider using the search to help us keep creating apps. You may delete the search icon, bookmark and homepage easily. Thank youAcharya Chanakya, Arthashastra,Chanakya, famous, Free Quotes, Free thoughts, Great quotes, Inspiration thoughts, Inspirational quotes, king's duties, Motivation quotes, Motivational Thoughts, Niti, Nitishastra, Quotations, Quote, wisdom

reviews.title: Suggestions
reviews.comment: Kindly provide an option whereby app resumes from the last quote read before exit. Most of the times when i click on next quote button, menu appears. So, kindly resolve that issue. Quotes are great. As soon as the above issues are resolved i will rate it higher.
